data.actual_result: Then colour of the pop up box does not change. See screenshot
data.expected_result: The colour of the pop-up box should be in accordance with your connection
data.short_description: Occasional mismatch in colours for VC latency measurer
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in voice chat - Be monitoring the latency meter by hovering mouse above it - Have connection change packet loss % so that the colour code changes, WITHOUT changing ping. - Colour of the pop-up latency meter does not change.
